ingredients.ingredient: 1 tablespoon finely grated fresh orange zest
2 (10 ounce) cans refrigerated biscuit dough, separated and halved

cookingTips: Coat biscuit pieces evenly in sugar mixture before layering
Fill Bundt pan roughly halfway so bread rises properly
Pour remaining glaze over top before baking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How does the sugar-orange coating caramelize during baking? Why does the structure work well for this style of bread?
